data.title: Bertrand Russell Society Award
data.meta_description: The Bertrand Russell Society Award is granted to a person or organization that has advanced the aims of the Bertrand Russell Society. Past recipients are: 2024 Center for Inquiry 2022 Bertrand Russell Peace Foundation 2021 Dr. Anthony Fauci 2020 Noam Chomsky 2019 Gideon Levy 2018 Bertrand Russell Archives 2017 Democracy Now! 2016 Philosophy Now 2015â€¦
data.text:
The Bertrand Russell Society Award is granted to a person or organization that has advanced the aims of the Bertrand Russell Society. Past recipients are:

2024 Center for Inquiry

2022 Bertrand Russell Peace Foundation

2021 Dr. Anthony Fauci

2020 Noam Chomsky

2019 Gideon Levy

2018 Bertrand Russell Archives

2017 Democracy Now!

2016 Philosophy Now

2015 A. C. Grayling

2014 Michael Ruse

2011 Brian Greene

2010 Jonathan Miller

2009 Richard Dawkins

2008 Mario Bunge

2006 Sir Martin Rees

2004 Daniel Dennett

2003 Katha Pollitt

2002 Studs Terkel

2001 Stephen Toulmin

2000 Stephen Jay Gould

1999 Dr. Henry Morgentaler (The Morgentaler Clinic)

1998 Irving Copi

1996 Willard Van Orman Quine

1995 Zero Population Growth

1993 Harry Ruja

1992 Karl Popper

1991 Planned Parenthood Federation of America

1989 Paul Edwards

1988 Paul Kurtz

1987 John Somerville

1986 People for the American Way

1985 Robert Jay Lifton and Lester Denonn

1984 Dora Black Russell

1983 Joseph Rotblat [1995 Nobel Peace Prize winner]

1982 Henry Kendall (Union of Concerned Scientists)

1981 Steve Allen

1980 Paul Arthur Schilpp
